summary: Replaces tinting with Nord tinting and adds two paler skin tones.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Dart98Rock.jpg[/img]

[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Updates.jpg[/img]
-3- I redone the entire mod, now includes the following races: Breton, Imperial, Nord, High Elf, Dark Elf, Wood Elf, and Redguard. All original skin tone is till on the races, also all races have original warpaint. 

-2- By request from a bro\', I updated it where the Wood Elf and High Elf race now have there original skin tone and the paler skin tone. To install just delete old version and add the new one. 

-1- By request the update includes the skin tone on the High Elf race. Also updated the DartHairColor-PalerWoodElf to include the High Elf race.

To install Updates, just replace the old .esp file.

[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/File-Description.jpg[/img]
Replaces vanilla races skin tone with the Nord skin tone and added a paler skin tone.
To show new skin tone go to \"showracemenu\".

--Main File--
PalerRaces, newest update file. Effects the following races: Breton, Dark Elf, High Elf, Imperial, Nord, Redguard, Wood Elf. All races have Nord Tinting, with two paler skin tones. All races also have original warpaint and skin tones.
--Updates--
PalerElf, old update.
PalerWoodElf_HighElf, old update.

[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Compadibility.jpg[/img]
Is not compatible with any other mod that adds color forms (hair colors, tint colors).
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Bugs.jpg[/img]
When going into \"showracemenu\" all colors will be set to default.
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Installation.jpg[/img]
Uncompress file using either 7zip or WinRar. Drag and Drop into the Skyrim data folder.
[img]http://www.dart98rock.com/Mods-Used-In-Screen-Shots.jpg[/img]
